title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.1 - Reimbursement for assistance to refugees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.1 - Reimbursement for assistance to refugees

State Regulations

Reimbursement for expenditures and costs incurred in
relation to assistance provided to refugees, entrants and other persons not
currently citizens of New York shall be claimed in accordance with applicable
instructions or directions of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
616.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
